Menace
[i]Killing Edge[/i] – Whenever Lon'Qu, Fearless Knight deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card or copy a [i]Crit[/i] ability of another creature you control.
[i]Fearless Rescuer[/i] – When Lon'Qu dies, you may return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {W}{B} [i](You may put this card over another Lon'Qu creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
